original_text: And when Zimri saw that the city was taken, he went into the citadel of the king's house and burned the king's house over him with fire and died,
korean_text: 시므리가 성읍이 함락됨을 보고 왕궁 요새에 들어가서 왕궁에 불을 지르고 그 가운데에서 죽었으니

sentences.original_text: And when Zimri saw that the city was taken,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 심리가 그 성이 함락된 것을 보았을 때,

sentences.original_text: he went into the citadel of the king's house
and burned the king's house over him with fire
